column5: Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable stay at our roomy, fully furnished, 4000 square foot Klondike house! Our 6 bedrooms can handle large groups or multiple families. Perfect for a family reunion! The open concept living room is complete with comfy couches and a flat screen TV, which is fully equipped with cable and wifi. Enjoy a rousing game of ping-pong, or cozy up for a movie in the theater room! Located in the heart of Round Rock, just off I-35, for a quick 30 min drive to downtown Austin.
column8: 6 Bedroom Family Home in Round Rock
